title: A new path to spillover: MHC-II entry of influenza A viruses.
abstract: Zoonotic spillover of influenza A viruses represents a threat to human health. Emerging research suggests that some influenza A viruses can enter host cells via MHC-II across species, potentially increasing spillover risk.
clean_text: a new path to spillover mhc ii entry of influenza a viruses zoonotic spillover of influenza a viruses represents a threat to human health emerging research suggests that some influenza a viruses can enter host cells via mhc ii across species potentially increasing spillover risk
